definitions.title: m.
definitions.body: ] restlessness, straying (?);—sf. [[ניִי וּמְרוּדִי]] La 3:19; pl. sf. [[יְמֵי]] [[עָנְיׇהּ וּמְרוּדֶיהָ]] La 1:7 (rd. prob. [[מְרוּדָהּ]] Nö:ZMG xxxvii (1883), 539); pl. [[וַעֲנִיִּם מְרוּדִים]] Is 58:7, usu. concr. the wandering (homeless) poor (Di thinks old Qal pass. Pt.; Che:Comm. rds. Hoph. [[מוּרָדִים]]; Buhl:Lex Hiph. [[מָרִידִים]]; Kö:ii. 1:128 takes MT abstr. for concr. [appos. of ´[[וַע]]:]; so Du Che:Hpt [´[[וַע]]: gloss], read perhaps pt. [[רָדִים]] ([[מ]] dittogr.)).
